___options.description: Custom options object supplied by user

___tags.description: Array of tags describing the pattern

___versions.description: Available semantic versions of the pattern

___displayName.description: Human readable name of the pattern

___demoPatterns.description: Dependencies of the pattern used for demo purposes

___name.description: Machine readable name of the pattern

___overrides.description: Options for overriding of core pattern behaviour

___files.description: Custom mapping between patternplate files and paths to use in exchange for this pattern

___demo.description: Custom url to use as demo for this pattern

____patternplate.description: Technical values saved by patternplate core

___meta.description: Custom meta data object supplied by user

___data.description: Custom data object supplied by user
